name: discovery-tsd
description: Generates TypeScript declaration files from Google's Discovery API
author: Dave Gramlich <callmehiphop@gmail.com>

scripts.compile: gts clean && tsc -p . && mkdir -p ./build/src/templates/ && cp ./src/templates/*.tmpl ./build/src/templates/ && mkdir -p ./build/test/fixtures/complex/ && cp ./test/fixtures/complex/* ./build/test/fixtures/complex/ && mkdir -p ./build/test/fixtures/methods/ && cp ./test/fixtures/methods/* ./build/test/fixtures/methods/ && mkdir -p ./build/test/fixtures/nested/ && cp ./test/fixtures/nested/* ./build/test/fixtures/nested/ && mkdir -p ./build/test/fixtures/simple/ && cp ./test/fixtures/simple/* ./build/test/fixtures/simple/
